content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Stone Furnace at positions (x=-13.0, y=-48.0), (x=-11.0, y=-48.0), and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (x=-18.5, y=-48.5), (x=-16.5, y=-48.5), (x=-13.5, y=-49.5), and (x=-14.5, y=-47.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (x=-14.5, y=-48.5), (x=-12.5, y=-49.5), and (x=-9.5, y=-49.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (x=41.5, y=-80.5), (x=42.5, y=-80.5), (x=44.5, y=-80.5), (x=45.5, y=-80.5), (x=47.5, y=-80.5), and (x=49.5, y=-80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=43.5, y=-80.5) and (x=41.5, y=-78.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure your inventory has sufficient space before attempting to harvest or extract items. Regularly transfer excess items to storage to avoid a full inventory.

### Errors in Supplying Furnaces
- Before attempting to supply iron ore to furnaces, verify that you have the necessary iron ore in your inventory.

### Errors in Extracting from Furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces contain the expected items before attempting extraction. Check for any warnings or errors indicating missing ingredients or full output slots.

### Errors in Placing Entities
- Verify that the target location for placing entities is unoccupied. Consider adjusting the position or spacing if an existing object is in the way.
